name: luapanda
description: lua debug and code tools for VS Code.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.enable.description: Enable/Disable code lingting. This is the master switch of code linting.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.luacheckPath.description: The laucheck executable file path, use plugin default config if not set.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.checkWhileTypin.description: Controls wether to check the syntax while typing.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.checkAfterSave.description: Controls wether to check the syntax after file saved.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.maxNumberOfProb.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the luacheck.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.ignoreFolderReg.description: The regular expressions used to ignore files in some specific folders. Use semicolons to separate different regular expressions.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.ignoreErrorCode.description: Used to ignore some warnings or errors. Use semicolons to separate different error codes. For example, 211 means "unused local variable", you will see "unused variable 'xxx' lua-analyzer(211)" in the problems window. View https://luacheck.readthedocs.io/en/stable/warnings.html for more information.

lua_analyzer.codeLinting.ignoreGlobal.description: Used to ignore global variable for luacheck. Use semicolons to separate different variables.

lua_analyzer.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

stopOnEntry.description:
After the debugger connect, it automatically stops at the first line of code called. 
调试器启动后自动停止在调用的第一行代码处。

cwd.description: exactltPathMode : 拼接路径 | autoPathMode : workspace 路径。

isNeedB64EncodeStr.description:
Whether use base64 encoding for transmit strings. default true. 
是否使用base64编码传输字符串，默认请开启。

luaFileExtension.description:
Lua file suffix. 
Lua文件后缀。

pathCaseSensitivity.description:
File path is case sensitive, default true. 
文件路径大小写敏感, 默认true。

connectionPort.description:
The port number of the connection. Default is 8818. 
设置连接的端口号，默认8818。

autoReconnect.description:
When disconnected by the lua end, VSCode automatically waits for new reconnection. 
当被lua端断开连接时，VSCode自动等待重连。

TempFilePath.description:
Temporary file storage path generated during debugging, please ensure this folder exists. 
调试产生的临时文件存放路径，请确保文件夹存在。

rootFolder.description: 记录vscode打开的目录，不要修改它的值，需用它找到 launch.json

logLevel.description:
Log level. 0: All information(for developer); 1: Only necessary information (default); 2: Only error. 
日志等级. 0:all所有信息(面向开发者); 1:info仅必要信息(默认); 2:error仅错误。

useCHook.description:
Use C Hook module to improve efficiency. The default is true. If set false debug with lua hook. 
使用C Hook模块, 提高运行效率。默认true。设置为false则使用 lua hook 调试。

packagePath.description:
Path added to package.path at runtime, such as /Script/?.lua. 
运行时加入package.path的路径, 如 /Script/?.lua。

luaPath.description:
Lua command path and file name such as C:/lua5.3/lua.exe. 
lua命令的路径和文件名. 如 C:/lua5.3/lua.exe。

docPathReplace.description: 被调试文件和VSCode中加载文件路径不一致时，通过此项设置，完成路径替换。输入格式["被替换掉的路径", "新路径"]。

autoPathMode.description:
Whether to use automatic path mode. 
是否使用自动路径模式。

updateTips.description:
Whether open LuaPanda automatic upgrade prompt. 
是否打开 LuaPanda 自动升级提示。

tag.description:
Mark run mode, don't modify it. There are three modes: normal, attach, single_file. 
标记运行方式，请勿修改。 有三种模式 normal , attach , single_file。

dbCheckBreakpoint.description: If adapter is client , the IP to connect. Default is '127.0.0.1'。

program.description:
Path to executable file which launched with debugger(not a lua file), default "". 
随调试器启动的可执行文件路径(非lua文件), 如无可以填""。

args.description:
Program execution parameters, the structure is an array of strings. 
program 执行时需要的参数, 结构是一个字符串数组。

stopOnEntry.description:
After the debugger connect, it automatically stops at the first line of code called. 
调试器启动后自动停止在调用的第一行代码处。

VSCodeAsClient.description: Usually adapter as Server, lua process as Client. this mode is invert these. Please also set connectionIP。
